comment.author: 18532986@N07
comment._content:
Coulommiers,France (USAAF code # A-58) was an active field from September 8,1944 to August 8,1945. Three different units spent time based there.
425th Night Fighter Squadron: from September to October 1944
410th Bomb Group: September 1944 to February 1945
437th Troop Carrier Group: February to July 1945
